projects.name: E-commerce Platform Redesign
projects.description: Led the complete redesign of a high-traffic e-commerce platform, implementing modern UI/UX practices and improving performance by 60%. Integrated advanced search functionality and personalized recommendations.
highlights: Reduced page load time by 60% through optimization
Implemented real-time inventory sync across 5 warehouses
Integrated Stripe payment processing with 99.9% uptime
Built responsive design supporting 50K+ daily users

projects.name: AI-Powered Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive analytics dashboard with AI-powered insights for business intelligence. Integrated machine learning models for predictive analytics and automated reporting.
highlights: Implemented real-time data visualization for 100+ metrics
Integrated ML models with 85% prediction accuracy

projects.name: Mobile Banking Application
projects.description: Built a secure mobile banking application from scratch with biometric authentication, real-time transaction tracking, and seamless money transfers. Compliant with PCI-DSS and SOC 2 standards.
